result.title: Roadmap and Synthesis of hubs
result.description: Setting up of five communities of practice (hubs) who will efficiently function as nucleus which concentric effects on roadmap and state of the art status, the outreach activities on awareness, network extension and education as well as on the exploitation. This deliverable is dedicated to form these hubs and place the nucleus in the respective region and the involvement of their cities.

result.title: Roadmap for the development of novel & improved materials models beyond existing gaps -T1.2
result.description: We shall define a Roadmap that identifies existing gaps that need to be filled with respect to materials models and methods. Based on an analysis of the materials model development requirements for specific problems relevant to industry the Roadmap shall also suggest a priority among needs.
